Post.title: Gentoo
Post._content:
### 
GentooLinux
#### 1. [Gentoo Linux ](https://bitbili.net/gentoo-linux-installation-and-usage-tutorial.html)
#### 2. [MacGentoo Linux](https://www.yafa.moe/post/install-gentoo-on-mac/)
#### 3. [Gentoo ](https://litterhougelangley.club/blog/2021/05/21/gentoo/)
#### 4. [The Unorthodox Gentoo Handbook I](https://blog.bugsur.xyz/gentoo-handbook-installation/)
#### 5. [Gentoo AMD64 Handbook](https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Handbook:AMD64)

### 



| /        |              |
| :---------- | :--------------- |
| libc        | glibc            |
| init script | systemd          |
| bootloader  | GRUB             |
| kernel      | liquorix-sources |

###  USB

livecd, manjarofedoraubuntufedoraarchgenfstabfstab)`https://mirrors6.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn`
linux

```bash
dd if=<iso> of=/dev/<device> bs=1M status=progress
```

windows`rufus``rufus`

### 

livecd`NetworkManager``dhcpcd`

`NetworkManager`(gui/tui/cli)`wpa_supplicant/iwd`(cli)`wpa_supplicant`:

```bash
wpa_passphrase <ESSID> <Password> > /etc/wpa_supplicant.conf
wpa_supplicant -iwlan0 -c/etc/wpa_supplicant.conf #wlan0wlp112s0
```

### 



```bash
fdisk -l
# 
lsblk
```

cfdisk

```bash
cfdisk -z /dev/nvme0n1 #nvme0n1
```

![](/images/2021-11-17_19-00.png)

:

|            | /                                            |  |  |
| -------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ------ | -------- |
| /dev/nvme0n1p1 | esp/100M() | /boot  | Fat32    |
| /dev/nvme0n1p2 | swap/16G(swap1-2)  | *none* | swap     |
| /dev/nvme0n1p3 | /(/home)           | /      | Btrfs    |



```bash
mkfs.fat -F 32 /dev/nvme0n1p1 #fat32esp
mkswap /dev/nvme0n1p2 #swap
mkfs.btrfs /dev/nvme0n1p3 #btrfs
```

Btrfs

```bash
mount -t btrfs /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt
cd /mnt
btrfs subvolume create vol_root
cd /
umount -lR /mnt
```



```bash
mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo
mount -t btrfs -o relatime,rw,compress=zstd:10,space_cache=v2,subvol=vol_root /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #
mount /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #btrfs
mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo/boot
mount /dev/nvme0n1p1 /mnt/gentoo/boot
swapon /dev/nvme0n1p2
cd /mnt/gentoo
```

### stage3

stage3ttylynx

```bash
lynx https://mirrors6.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/gentoo/releases/amd64/autobuilds
```

stage3init scriptlibcprofile

systemd



```bash
tar xpvf stage3-amd64-*.tar.xz --xattrs-include='*.*' --numeric-owner
```

fstablivecdarch

```bash
genfstab -U /mnt/gentoo > /mnt/gentoo/etc/fstab
```

`make.conf`()`skylake`Coffee LakeCPU

```bash
# These settings were set by the catalyst build script that automatically
# built this stage.
# Please consult /usr/share/portage/config/make.conf.example for a more
# detailed example.
NTHREADS=12 #

COMMON_FLAGS="-march=skylake -O3 -pipe -fgraphite-identity -floop-nest-optimize -fno-stack-protector -fno-align-functions -fno-align-jumps -fno-align-loops -fno-align-labels" #COMMON_FLAGSgccgraphiteuseCPUwiki-march=native
CFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
CXXFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
FFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
FCFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O3 -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,--hash-style=gnu -Wl,--sort-common -Wl,--strip-all" #LDFLAGSnetworkmanagerenv
RUSTFLAGS="-C opt-level=3 -C target-cpu=skylake" #CPUwiki-march=native

# NOTE: This stage was built with the bindist Use flag enabled
PORTDIR="/var/db/repos/gentoo"
DISTDIR="/var/cache/distfiles"
PKGDIR="/var/cache/binpkgs"
PORTAGE_TMPDIR="/tmp" #systemd/tmptmpfs

# This sets the language of build output to English.
# Please keep this setting intact when reporting bugs.
LC_MESSAGES=C

MAKEOPTS="-j${NTHREADS} -l${NTHREADS}"
PORTAGE_NICENESS=15
GENTOO_MIRRORS="https://mirrors6.tuna.edu.cn/gentoo" #
USE="systemd lto pgo graphite ccache staging bluetooth alsa pulseaudio ffmpeg openssl network wifi networkmanager connection-sharing iptables zstd lz4 7zip rar btrfs policykit dbus qemu vdpau vaapi vulkan vkd3d d3d9 nvidia nvenc steamfonts trayicon systray -pipewire -joystick -games -education -wayland -xinerama -firewall -ppp -iwd -dhclient -elogind -kaccounts -webengine -kwallet -bittorrent -phonon -vlc -gnome -gnome-keyring -gnome-shell -gnome-online-accounts -passwdqc -bindist -clang -ssp -dhcpcd -netifrc -consolekit -doc -gtk-doc -handbook -spell -grub -oss -gpm" #USE
ACCEPT_KEYWORDS="~amd64" #~keywords
ACCEPT_LICENSE="*" #license*
GRUB_PLATFORMS="efi-64" #GRUB+EFI
EMERGE_DEFAULT_OPTS="--keep-going --with-bdeps=y --jobs=${NTHREADS} --load-average=${NTHREADS}"
L10N="en-US zh-CN en zh"
LINGUAS="en_US zh_CN en zh"
VIDEO_CARDS="nvidia intel i965 iris" #IntelNVIDIA
ALSA_CARDS="hda-intel"
INPUT_DEVICES="libinput" #
LLVM_TARGETS="X86 NVPTX" #X86NNVPTXAAMDGPU
RUBY_TARGETS="ruby30"
ABI_X86="64 32" #wine-staging,lutris
MICROCODE_SIGNATURES="-S" #intelmicrocode
FEATURES="ccache" #ccache
CCACHE_DIR="/var/cache/ccache" #ccache
CPU_FLAGS_X86="aes avx avx2 f16c fma3 mmx mmxext pclmul popcnt rdrand sse sse2 sse3 sse4_1 sse4_2 ssse3" #CPUcpuid2cpuflags
CONFIG_PROTECT="/usr/share/sddm/scripts/Xsetup"
UNINSTALL_IGNORE="/bin /lib /lib64 /sbin /usr/sbin" #usr-merge
```

main reporepos.conf

```bash
mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo/etc/portage/repos.conf
cp /mnt/gentoo/usr/share/portage/config/repos.conf /mnt/gentoo/etc/portage/repos.conf/gentoo.conf
```

`sync-uri`rsync

```bash
sync-uri = rsync://mirrors.bfsu.edu.cn/gentoo-portage
```

chroot

```bash
cp --dereference /etc/resolv.conf /mnt/gentoo/etc/resolv.conf
mount -t proc /proc /mnt/gentoo/proc
mount --rbind /sys /mnt/gentoo/sys
mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/sys
mount --rbind /dev /mnt/gentoo/dev
mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/dev
chroot /mnt/gentoo /bin/bash
env-update && . /etc/profile
```

`emerge-webrsync`repopackageuse

```bash
echo 'app-text/ghostscript-gpl -l10n_zh-CN' > /etc/portage/package.use/ghostscript-gpl #zh-CN
```

`pgo``lto``graphite`

```bash
echo 'sys-devel/gcc pgo lto graphite' > /etc/portage/package.use/gcc
emerge -v1 gcc
eselect gcc list
eselect gcc set X #Xgcc
env-update && . /etc/profile
emerge --depclean
```

: `eselect news read``@world`:

```bash
USE=-bluetooth emerge -1 python #
emerge -avuDN @world
emerge --depclean
```

`etc-update`/etc

localehostname

```bash
ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/timezone
nano -w /etc/locale.gen
------------------------------------------------
        C.UTF8 UTF-8
        en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8
        zh_CN.UTF-8 UTF-8
------------------------------------------------
locale-gen
eselect locale list #
eselect locale set n #n
echo 'ALIENWARE' > /etc/hostname #(none)localhost
```



```bash
emerge -av networkmanager dev-vcs/git btrfs-progs neovim eselect-repository systemd-cron doas mlocate intel-microcode grub:2 #,sudo,doassudo()
```



```bash
systemctl enable NetworkManager
systemctl enable cron.target
#sudo,visudo
nvim /etc/doas.conf:
------------------------------------------------
        permit keepenv :wheel
        permit nopass keepenv root
------------------------------------------------
#passwdqcuse
nvim /etc/security/passwdqc:
------------------------------------------------
        min=3,3,3,3,3
        max=8
        passphrase=0
        match=4
        similar=permit
        random=47
        enforce=none
        retry=3
------------------------------------------------
passwd
ln -sf /proc/self/mounts /etc/mtab
systemd-machine-id-setup
```

### bootloader

Houge Langley`xanmod-hybrid``liquorix-sources`

```bash
eselect repository enable gentoo-zh
mkdir -p /etc/portage/package.accept_keywords; echo 'sys-kernel/liquorix-sources ~amd64' >> /etc/portage/package.accept_keywords/liquorix-sources #make.confACCEPT_KEYWORDS="~amd64"
emerge -av liquorix-sources
eselect kernel set 1
cd /usr/src/linux
make mrproper
cp /var/db/repos/gentoo-zh/sys-kernel/liquorix-sources/config/default-config /usr/src/linux/.config #
make modules_prepare
make menuconfig
make -jX -lX #Xlscpu
make modules_install
make install
```

`gentoo-kernel-bin``emerge -av gentoo-kernel-bin`

GRUB

```bash
# EFI
grub-install --target=x86_64-efi --efi-directory=/boot --bootloader-id=GRUB # --efi-directoryesp
# BIOS
grub-install --target=i386-pc /dev/sdX # /dev/sdX

#grub.cfg
grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg
```



```bash
#zozx
useradd -m -G wheel,video,kvm,usb,users,portage,plugdev zozx
passwd zozx
```

### 

chroot

```bash
exit
umount -lR /mnt/gentoo
reboot
```


```bash
mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo
mount -t btrfs -o relatime,rw,compress=zstd:10,space_cache=v2,subvol=vol_root /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #
mount /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #btrfs
```


systemd

```bash

```

`make.conf`()`skylake`Coffee LakeCPU

```bash
# These settings were set by the catalyst build script that automatically
# built this stage.
# Please consult /usr/share/portage/config/make.conf.example for a more
# detailed example.
NTHREADS=12 #

COMMON_FLAGS="-march=skylake -O3 -pipe -fgraphite-identity -floop-nest-optimize -fno-stack-protector -fno-align-functions -fno-align-jumps -fno-align-loops -fno-align-labels" #COMMON_FLAGSgccgraphiteuseCPUwiki-march=native

LC_MESSAGES=C

MAKEOPTS="-j${NTHREADS} -l${NTHREADS}"
PORTAGE_NICENESS=15
GENTOO_MIRRORS="https://mirrors6.tuna.edu.cn/gentoo" #
USE="systemd lto pgo graphite ccache staging bluetooth alsa pulseaudio ffmpeg openssl network wifi networkmanager connection-sharing iptables zstd lz4 7zip rar btrfs policykit dbus qemu vdpau vaapi vulkan vkd3d d3d9 nvidia nvenc steamfonts trayicon systray -pipewire -joystick -games -education -wayland -xinerama -firewall -ppp -iwd -dhclient -elogind -kaccounts -webengine -kwallet -bittorrent -phonon -vlc -gnome -gnome-keyring -gnome-shell -gnome-online-accounts -passwdqc -bindist -clang -ssp -dhcpcd -netifrc -consolekit -doc -gtk-doc -handbook -spell -grub -oss -gpm" #USE

ACCEPT_LICENSE="*" #license*
GRUB_PLATFORMS="efi-64" #GRUB+EFI
EMERGE_DEFAULT_OPTS="--keep-going --with-bdeps=y --jobs=${NTHREADS} --load-average=${NTHREADS}"

LINGUAS="en_US zh_CN en zh"

ABI_X86="64 32" #wine-staging,lutris
MICROCODE_SIGNATURES="-S" #intelmicrocode
FEATURES="ccache" #ccache
CCACHE_DIR="/var/cache/ccache" #ccache
CPU_FLAGS_X86="aes avx avx2 f16c fma3 mmx mmxext pclmul popcnt rdrand sse sse2 sse3 sse4_1 sse4_2 ssse3" #CPUcpuid2cpuflags
```

PORTAGE_NICENESS=15
GENTOO_MIRRORS="https://mirrors6.tuna.edu.cn/gentoo" #
USE="systemd lto pgo graphite ccache staging bluetooth alsa pulseaudio ffmpeg openssl network wifi networkmanager connection-sharing iptables zstd lz4 7zip rar btrfs policykit dbus qemu vdpau vaapi vulkan vkd3d d3d9 nvidia nvenc steamfonts trayicon systray -pipewire -joystick -games -education -wayland -xinerama -firewall -ppp -iwd -dhclient -elogind -kaccounts -webengine -kwallet -bittorrent -phonon -vlc -gnome -gnome-keyring -gnome-shell -gnome-online-accounts -passwdqc -bindist -clang -ssp -dhcpcd -netifrc -consolekit -doc -gtk-doc -handbook -spell -grub -oss -gpm" #USE
ACCEPT_KEYWORDS="~amd64" #~keywords
ACCEPT_LICENSE="*" #license*
GRUB_PLATFORMS="efi-64" #GRUB+EFI
EMERGE_DEFAULT_OPTS="--keep-going --with-bdeps=y --jobs=${NTHREADS} --load-average=${NTHREADS}"
L10N="en-US zh-CN en zh"
LINGUAS="en_US zh_CN en zh"
VIDEO_CARDS="nvidia intel i965 iris" #IntelNVIDIA
ALSA_CARDS="hda-intel"
INPUT_DEVICES="libinput" #
LLVM_TARGETS="X86 NVPTX" #X86NNVPTXAAMDGPU
RUBY_TARGETS="ruby30"
ABI_X86="64 32" #wine-staging,lutris
MICROCODE_SIGNATURES="-S" #intelmicrocode
FEATURES="ccache" #ccache
CCACHE_DIR="/var/cache/ccache" #ccache
CPU_FLAGS_X86="aes avx avx2 f16c fma3 mmx mmxext pclmul popcnt rdrand sse sse2 sse3 sse4_1 sse4_2 ssse3" #CPUcpuid2cpuflags
CONFIG_PROTECT="/usr/share/sddm/scripts/Xsetup"
UNINSTALL_IGNORE="/bin /lib /lib64 /sbin /usr/sbin" #usr-merge

main reporepos.conf

mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo/etc/portage/repos.conf
cp /mnt/gentoo/usr/share/portage/config/repos.conf /mnt/gentoo/etc/portage/repos.conf/gentoo.conf

sync-urirsync

sync-uri = rsync://mirrors.bfsu.edu.cn/gentoo-portage

chroot

cp --dereference /etc/resolv.conf /mnt/gentoo/etc/resolv.conf
mount -t proc /proc /mnt/gentoo/proc
mount --rbind /sys /mnt/gentoo/sys
mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/sys
mount --rbind /dev /mnt/gentoo/dev
mount --make-rslave /mnt/gentoo/dev
chroot /mnt/gentoo /bin/bash
env-update && . /etc/profile

emerge-webrsyncrepopackageuse

echo 'app-text/ghostscript-gpl -l10n_zh-CN' > /etc/portage/package.use/ghostscript-gpl #zh-CN

pgoltographite

echo 'sys-devel/gcc pgo lto graphite' > /etc/portage/package.use/gcc
emerge -v1 gcc
eselect gcc list
eselect gcc set X #Xgcc
env-update && . /etc/profile
emerge --depclean

: eselect news read@world:

USE=-bluetooth emerge -1 python #
emerge -avuDN @world
emerge --depclean

etc-update/etc

localehostname

ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/timezone
nano -w /etc/locale.gen
------------------------------------------------
        C.UTF8 UTF-8
        en_US.UTF-8 UTF-8
        zh_CN.UTF-8 UTF-8
------------------------------------------------
locale-gen
eselect locale list #
eselect locale set n #n
echo 'ALIENWARE' > /etc/hostname #(none)localhost


emerge -av networkmanager dev-vcs/git btrfs-progs neovim eselect-repository systemd-cron doas mlocate intel-microcode grub:2 #,sudo,doassudo()


systemctl enable NetworkManager
systemctl enable cron.target
#sudo,visudo
nvim /etc/doas.conf:
------------------------------------------------
        permit keepenv :wheel
        permit nopass keepenv root
------------------------------------------------
#passwdqcuse
nvim /etc/security/passwdqc:
------------------------------------------------
        min=3,3,3,3,3
        max=8
        passphrase=0
        match=4
        similar=permit
        random=47
        enforce=none
        retry=3
------------------------------------------------
passwd
ln -sf /proc/self/mounts /etc/mtab
systemd-machine-id-setup

bootloader

Houge Langleyxanmod-hybridliquorix-sources

eselect repository enable gentoo-zh
mkdir -p /etc/portage/package.accept_keywords; echo 'sys-kernel/liquorix-sources ~amd64' >> /etc/portage/package.accept_keywords/liquorix-sources #make.confACCEPT_KEYWORDS="~amd64"
emerge -av liquorix-sources
eselect kernel set 1
cd /usr/src/linux
make mrproper
cp /var/db/repos/gentoo-zh/sys-kernel/liquorix-sources/config/default-config /usr/src/linux/.config #
make modules_prepare
make menuconfig
make -jX -lX #Xlscpu
make modules_install
make install

gentoo-kernel-binemerge -av gentoo-kernel-bin

GRUB

# EFI
grub-install --target=x86_64-efi --efi-directory=/boot --bootloader-id=GRUB # --efi-directoryesp
# BIOS
grub-install --target=i386-pc /dev/sdX # /dev/sdX

#grub.cfg
grub-mkconfig -o /boot/grub/grub.cfg


#zozx
useradd -m -G wheel,video,kvm,usb,users,portage,plugdev zozx
passwd zozx

chroot

exit
umount -lR /mnt/gentoo
reboot

linux

wpa_supplicant -iwlan0 -c/etc/wpa_supplicant.conf #wlan0wlp112s0

# 
lsblk

cfdisk

:

/
/dev/nvme0n1p1 esp/100M() /boot Fat32
/dev/nvme0n1p2 swap/16G(swap1-2) none swap
/dev/nvme0n1p3 /(/home) / Btrfs

Btrfs

mount -t btrfs /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt
cd /mnt
btrfs subvolume create vol_root
cd /
umount -lR /mnt


mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo
mount -t btrfs -o relatime,rw,compress=zstd:10,space_cache=v2,subvol=vol_root /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #
mount /dev/nvme0n1p3 /mnt/gentoo #btrfs
mkdir -p /mnt/gentoo/boot
mount /dev/nvme0n1p1 /mnt/gentoo/boot
swapon /dev/nvme0n1p2
cd /mnt/gentoo

systemd

# These settings were set by the catalyst build script that automatically
# built this stage.

# detailed example.
NTHREADS=12 #

COMMON_FLAGS="-march=skylake -O3 -pipe -fgraphite-identity -floop-nest-optimize -fno-stack-protector -fno-align-functions -fno-align-jumps -fno-align-loops -fno-align-labels" #COMMON_FLAGSgccgraphiteuseCPUwiki-march=native
CFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
CXXFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
FFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
FCFLAGS="${COMMON_FLAGS}"
LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O3 -Wl,--as-needed -Wl,--hash-style=gnu -Wl,--sort-common -Wl,--strip-all" #LDFLAGSnetworkmanagerenv
RUSTFLAGS="-C opt-level=3 -C target-cpu=skylake" #CPUwiki-march=native

# NOTE: This stage was built with the bindist Use flag enabled
PORTDIR="/var/db/repos/gentoo"
DISTDIR="/var/cache/distfiles"

Post.title: Secure BootLinux
Post._content:
### 


|        |              |
| :--------- | :--------------- |
|        | Gentoo           |
|        | Alienware M15 R1 |
| Bootloader | systemd-boot     |

### PreLoader (Microsoft)

PreLoader`https://blog.hansenpartnership.com/linux-foundation-secure-boot-system-released`overlaypreloader-signedebuildoverlay`https://github.com/zozx/zozx-overlay` (repo)
```bash
eselect repository enable zozx-overlay
# 
layman -a zozx-overlay

# emerge
emerge --sync && emerge -v preloader-signed
```

PreLoader

```bash
cp /usr/share/preloader-signed/{PreLoader,HashTool}.efi path-to-bootloader # path-to-bootloaderbootloader
efibootmgr -v -c -L "PreLoader" -l path-to-PreLoader.efi # efibootmgrpath-to-Preloader.efiesp
reboot # BIOSSecure Boot
```

PreLoaderHashHashToolBootloaderefivmlinuz/BzImage.efi

### 

BIOSPK,KEK,db`https://wiki.archlinux.org/title/Unified_Extensible_Firmware_Interface/Secure_Boot#Using_your_own_keys`Setup ModesbkeysyncBIOS (BIOS)
